name: XYIDactyl Agent
author: xyidactyl@app.com
description: Self-hosted monitoring, alerting, and automation agent for the XYIDactyl iOS app. Runs as a background worker with zero inbound networking.

variables.name: Agent UUID
variables.description: Unique identifier for this agent instance. Generated by the iOS app during deployment.

variables.name: Agent Secret
variables.description: Shared secret for encryption. Generated by the iOS app during deployment.

variables.name: Panel URL
variables.description: Full URL of the Pterodactyl panel (e.g., https://panel.example.com).

variables.name: Panel API Key
variables.description: Admin API key for the Pterodactyl panel.

variables.name: Sampling Interval
variables.description: How often to poll server resources (in seconds). Default: 30.

variables.name: Retention Days
variables.description: How many days to keep monitoring data. Maximum: 30.

variables.name: Push Provider
variables.description: Push notification provider: 'dev' (logs to console) or 'apns' (Apple Push).

variables.name: APNs Key (Base64)
variables.description: Base64-encoded .p8 key file for Apple Push Notifications. Required when PUSH_PROVIDER=apns.

variables.name: APNs Key ID
variables.description: Key ID from Apple Developer account. Required when PUSH_PROVIDER=apns.

variables.name: APNs Team ID
variables.description: Team ID from Apple Developer account. Required when PUSH_PROVIDER=apns.

variables.name: APNs Bundle ID
variables.description: iOS app bundle identifier. Required when PUSH_PROVIDER=apns.

variables.name: Log Level
variables.description: Logging verbosity: debug, info, warn, error.
